name: Froakie
description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Protean
abilities.effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.  The type change takes place just before the move is used.
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's using.
